title: Daler Nazarov. Music For Films. Tanker Tango Final

sources.title: Daler Nazarov. Music For Films. Tanker Tango Final
sources.description: Title: Tanker 'Tango' - Танкер 'Танго' (2006) Directed by: Bakhtyar Khudojnazarov Date of birth: May 29, 1965, Dushanbe, Tajikistan Writing credits: Roman Hrush, Aleksei Poyarkov Music: Daler Nazarov Year: 2006 Country: Russia Language: Russian Color: Color Runtime: 110 min. Synopsis A young businessman Andrey Grekov has to pay his debts but the problem is that he no longer has any money and private property. The only way for him is to accept an offer to transfer oil on an old tanker from Poland to Germany. But is everything that easy? On the way Andrey gets involved in a terrorist conspiracy and life of his family is in danger, his life is in danger...
